thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com | 5 of 83
thread.title: Scott Albergate

author: Scott Albergate
title: Scott Albergate
text: I had been searching for a good and efficient way to announce that I was moving my office. Moving a professional office is nerve-wracking, especially the concern that people won't be able to find you. Greenvelope.com provided exactly the solution I needed and, what's more, they have an exceptional collection of of e-cards to use: artful, colorful, and attention-grabbing. My clients and friends loved them. Thanks so much Greenvelope.com for helping me give notice so I could make a successful move.
